text: Plus as a hosting control panel for
developers website builders and
designers that can be used to manage
websites applications domains
certificates mailboxes and more with
Plesk
you can administer WordPress Joomla and
Drupal website all on a single instance
in this video we will configure a Plesk
instance in Amazon lightsail and add a
few domains and websites with let's
encrypt SSL TLS certificates for HTTPS
support for more information about + k--
browse to the address shown on the
screen in the + documentation the steps
covered in this video include
configuring the light cell firewall for
plus getting the +1 time login address
signing in to plex
for the first time adding domains 2 plus
key and installing applications
configuring the light cell dns for the
added domains and the installing
certificates for domains in plus now
before you can start using plus there
are a few things you need to do first
create a plus instance and light cell
and create DNS zones in light sail for
the domains that you will administer in
plus
browse to the addresses shown on the
screen if you need information about how
to set up these prerequisites keep in
mind that light cell can host the DNS
for up to three domains if you need to
add more domains then we recommend using
Amazon route 53 for more information
browse to the address shown on the
screen in the route 53 documentation
okay now that we have the prerequisites
in place let's get started so by this
point you should have a running plus
instance and one or more domains added
as DNS zones in lightsail before you can
sign into the plus panel you must open a
few ports on the instance navigate to
the instance management page and choose
the networking tab add four new entries
under the firewall section
at TCP ports 53 and UDP port 53 for
networking TCP port 80 443 to access the
plus panel and TCP ports eight four four
seven for updates and upgrades choose
save to open the ports for the instance
next you must get the one-time login
address to create an administrator
account for the plus panel to do this
connect to your plus instance using SSH
the browser-based
SSH terminal in the light cell console
is the easiest way to connect to your
instance enter the commands shown on the
screen to get the one-time login address
for the plus panel highlight one of the
addresses shown on the screen
open the browser-based SSH client
clipboard and then copy or cut the
address to your local clipboard to sign
into the + panel open a new browser tab
and navigate to the address that you
copied or cut to your clipboard you may
see a security prompt stating that the
website is not private or secured choose
advanced and then proceed fill in the
fields shown on the page accept the
end-user license agreement and then
enter plus plus will take a few minutes
to initialize and then you will be
redirected to the plus key panel in the
plus panel you can administer multiple
domains and website under a single Plesk
instance each domain can have its own
website or application for demonstration
purposes I will add Rob box one two
three com Rob box one two three net and
Rob box one two three org I will then
install a different application under
each domain WordPress Drupal and Joomla
choose add domain in the plus Capano
first I will add Rob box one two three
calm enter a domain name a username and
a password the username and password are
used only if you access your websites
using FTP and SSH by the way if you want
to learn more about FTP and SSH Brown
to the address shown on the screen in
the plus commentation skip the step to
configure the SSL TLS certificate we
will do that later in this video now I
will add Rob ox123 net fill in the
fields shown on the page again skip the
step to configure an SSL TLS certificate
and finally I will add Rob ox123 org
fill in the fields shown on the page and
again skip the step to configure an SSL
TLS certificate to install wordpress on
one of the domains choose install
WordPress listed under that domain I
will install WordPress on the Rob ox123
com domain in the prompt that appears
confirm the settings and install
WordPress requires a few minutes to
install now I will install a different
app on the Rob ox123 net domain choose
web sites and domains in the left
navigation of the + panel scroll to find
the desired domain then choose install
apps under that domain I will install
Drupal on this domain Drupal requires a
few minutes to install and now I will
install a different app on the Rob box
one two three org domain choose web
sites and domains in the left navigation
of the + panel scroll to find the
desired domain and then choose install
apps under that domain I will install
Joomla on this domain Joomla requires a
few minutes to install now that all of
the domains have an app installed on
them I will configure the DNS zone for
the domains to point to the plus
constancy you must do this for every
domain that you intend to manage using
Plesk go back to the lightsail console
and browse to the networking tab on the
Lite cell homepage choose one of the
domains and edit the apex and WW address
records to resolve to the plus key
instance choose the Save icon
now I will repeat the steps for the Rob
box one two three net domain and edit
the apex and WW address records to
resolve to the plus key instance and
finally I will repeat the steps for the
Rob box one two three orga domain and
edit the apex n WW address records to
resolve to the plus K instance the final
step is to configure ssl certificate on
each domain to enable HTTPS go back to
the plus panel choose web sites and
domains in the left navigation under a
configured domain choose let's encrypt
in the form that appears choose include
a W sub domain and then install now I
will repeat the steps for the Rob box
one two three net domain by choosing the
let's encrypt option for that domain
selecting include a W sub domain and
then installing finally I will repeat
the steps for the Rob box one two three
orga domain by choosing the let's
encrypt option for that domain selecting
include a W sub domain and then
installing after the certificates are
configured each of the domains will
redirect from an HTTP to an HTTPS
connection as shown on the screen
finally to access the plus key panel
once again just browse to the IP address
of your Plesk
instance and follow the instructions on
the page in this video we showed you how
to configure a + Kinston sin Amazon
light cell and we added a few domains
and websites with let's encrypt SSL TLS
certificates for HTTP support for more
information about the steps covered in
this video
browse to the address shown on the
screen and for more information about
using the + panel browse to the address
shown on the screen in the +
documentation
thank you for watching
